title: Hebrews 3:1
description: Scripture reference used in FCT Module 5
content:
## Hebrews 3:1

> "Consider Jesus, focus your attention,". Hebrews 3:1 ESV
\[1\] Therefore, holy brothers, you who share in a heavenly calling, consider Jesus, the apostle and high priest of our confession.

*ESV Translation*
